definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: All assignment operators return the value that is assigned to the left operand.
sentences.chinese: 所有的賦值運算符都返回賦給左操作數的值。

sentences.english: The operator must have anl-value as its left operand.
sentences.chinese: 該運算符必須將左值作爲其左操作數。

sentences.english: If the character is an operand, push it onto the stack.
sentences.chinese: 如果字符是一個操作數，把它壓入堆棧。

sentences.english: The result of the operation is the value of the operand "before" it has been decremented.
sentences.chinese: 該運算的結果是操作數減小“之前”的值。

sentences.english: We can't even elect a president and have every vote count.
sentences.chinese: 我們選總統，不能保證沒張投票都作數。

sentences.english: In postfix notation, the operator comes after its operands.
sentences.chinese: 在後綴表示法中，操作符位於操作數後面。

sentences.english: If the character is an operand, append it to the result string.
sentences.chinese: 如果字符是操作數，將它添加到結果字符串。

sentences.english: But if what you bought is a poisonous apple, this experience doesn't count to admire.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你本身買的就是毒蘋果，此經驗不作數哈。

sentences.english: The expressions created are a combination of arithmetic and logical operators, plus operands.
sentences.chinese: 表達式包含算術和邏輯運算符以及操作數。

sentences.english: Those will be signs of signs of a turnaround, not the real thing.
sentences.chinese: 那些都是預示經濟復甦的信號的信號，不能作數。

sentences.english: The result of the operation is the value of the operand "after" it has been decremented.
sentences.chinese: 該運算的結果是操作數減小“之後”的值。

sentences.english: The compiler supplies the appropriate operand in the assembly language code it generates.
sentences.chinese: 編譯器在自己生成的彙編語言中提供了適當的操作數。

sentences.english: Get operands and perform the operation.
sentences.chinese: 獲取操作數並執行運算。

sentences.english: In prefix notation, the operator is written before its operands.
sentences.chinese: 前綴表示法中，操作符寫在操作數的前面。

sentences.english: High volume also counts for a lot.
sentences.chinese: 高容積很多時候同樣作數。

sentences.english: Often, the order of operand evaluation has no impact on the result of the expression.
sentences.chinese: 通常，操作數的求值順序不會影響表達式的結果。
